sentences.en: Do you really think winning the lottery would make you happy?
sentences.cn: 你真的认为彩票中奖会带给你幸福吗？

sentences.en: He bought lottery tickets from handicapped people.
sentences.cn: 他从残疾人手中买奖券.
他在抽彩中捷足先登赢得1000英镑.

sentences.en: He won no less than ￡5000 in the lottery.
sentences.cn: 他居然中了5000英镑的奖券.

sentences.en: I was tickled pink when I found I had won a prize in the lottery.
sentences.cn: 当我得知我购买彩票得了奖后,我非常高兴.

sentences.en: Imagine winning the local lottery first prize of £5,000.
sentences.cn: 想象一下中个5,000英镑的当地彩票头奖吧。

sentences.en: She bought a lottery ticket and won more than $33 million.
sentences.cn: 她买了张彩票，中了3,300多万美元。

sentences.en: She had the prize - winning lottery ticket.
She won a fortune in a lottery.
sentences.cn: 她在一次抽奖中赢了一笔大钱.

sentences.en: Since winning the lottery, they've been living in clover.
sentences.cn: 中奖之后, 他们过着舒适优裕的生活.

sentences.en: The lottery was a great charity.
sentences.cn: 彩票倒真是大慈大悲的好东西.

sentences.en: The proceeds from the lottery go towards sports and recreation, as well as swelling the coffers of the government.
sentences.cn: 彩票收入用于发展体育和娱乐产业，同时还用来充实国库。

sentences.en: The two lottery winners decided to split the money fifty - fifty.
sentences.cn: 两位彩票奖得主决定平分奖金.

sentences.en: They thought themselves lucky in the lottery of life.
sentences.cn: 他们认为自己是变幻莫测的人生中的幸运者.

sentences.en: They were talking about the Lottery.
We freaked out when we won the lottery.
sentences.cn: 中了奖券,我们兴奋极了.

trans.tran_en: a game used to make money for a state or a  charity  in which people buy tickets with a series of numbers on them. If their number is picked by chance, they win money or a prize.
